trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Wheaton
There were 2 other sightings in Wheaton on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: 2 bright lights apart followed by 2 bright orange lights close toghter followed by 3 more in the northen sky
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sitting in the Dupage county fair ground grandstand on july 4th 2012 at about 930-1030 watching surrounding town fireworks (our town was canceled due to a bad storm and no power). We noticed these bright orange lights moving at a good rate of speed west to east and there was no noise. Wewatched them for about 15 min and they they just disappered I have a picture of 3 of them and my daughter has a video. There were no planes or any aircraft in the area. The 2 that were close were almost right next to each other.
